com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.basis

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.basis.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores information about server, sends messages created by Sensor to server

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server(ServerPanel panel,
      Logger logger,
      java.lang.String givenName,
      java.lang.String givenIp,
      int givenPort)
        Checks, if ether one of givenName or givenIp is set and validates them. Sets connection to false
        Parameters:
        panel - GUI panel for showing server information, not null
        logger - adapter logger, not null
        givenName - server hostname, null if givenIp is not null
        givenIp - server ip, null if givenName is not null
        givenPort - server port, not null

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        public java.nio.ByteBuffer sendMessage(java.nio.ByteBuffer message)
        Tries to send message created by Sensor to server. If successful, returns response from server.

        Shows errors:

        • SERVER_NOT_RESPONDING if server not responding over then SOCKET_TIMEOUT
        • SERVER_CONNECT if cannot connect to server

        Parameters:
        message - message according to server <-> adapter communication protocol
        Returns:
        server response or null if an error occurred

      • getIpAsString

        public static java.lang.String getIpAsString(java.net.InetAddress address)
        Gets ip address to string format from InetAddress given as parameter
        Parameters:
        address -
        Returns:
        ip address formatted as string

        Returns:
        true if is connected, false otherwise

        Returns if last server response was in wrong format
